description.narrative: Indonesia - Green Prosperity Project: This project will provide technical and financial assistance for projects in renewable energy and natural resource management to raise rural household incomes, and is expected to reduce reliance on fossil fuels, improve land management practices, protect natural capital, and complement efforts to reduce emissions from deforestation and environmental degradation.

title.narrative: Green Prosperity: Community-Based Off-Grid Renewable Energy Grant Portfolio
Green Prosperity: On Grid Renewable Energy Grant Portfolio
Green Prosperity: Participatory Land Use Planning
Green Prosperity: Social Forestry Grant Portfolio
Indonesia STAR Report: Full Program Lifecycle Report
Promoting Green Growth with Grants in Indonesia
Promoting On-Grid Renewable Energy in Indonesia
Promoting Sustainable Cocoa Production in Indonesia
Pursuing Green Growth Through Off-Grid Energy in Indonesia

condition.narrative: Prior to the initial Disbursement of Program Funding for the Participatory Land Use Planning Activity, the Technical Assistance and Oversight Activity or the GP Facility Activity in any district, MCA-Indonesia shall have entered into memoranda of understanding, in form and substance satisfactory to MCC, with such district and its related province
